title: Rising rates to hit net interest income, el niño may hit loan kitty: Vivek Karve of M&M Financial
description:
Vivek Karve, CFO, M&M Financial

“We believe there is an upside risk to the interest rate table and we believe that rates will continue to rise for some more time before they start sliding. Yes, the cost of borrowing is higher, it may inch up even further sometime more before it stabilises. NII may ...
